member.name: T:Dundas.Olap.Data.Mdx.MdxQueryBuilder
member.summary: Helper class that builds ADOMD MDX query string.
member.remarks: method takes query objects and returns back an MDX query string.

member.summary: Default public constructor.

member.summary: Public constructor.
member.param: True if data provider supports selection of multiple dimension members on the Slicer axis.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Mdx.MdxQueryBuilder.GetCommandText(Dundas.Olap.Data.CubeDataSchema,Dundas.Olap.Data.AxisDescriptorCollection,Dundas.Olap.Data.AxisDescriptor,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates ADOMD MDX command string based on requested dimension members and axes.
member.param: Cube data schema.
An object that describes requested axis.
An object that describes the slicer axis.
A string value that describes the cube name of the command.
A bool value that determines whether empty cells are shown in the command.
member.returns: A string that contains the result MDX query text.

member.summary: Gets axis set string of the query.

True if this is a slicer axis.

member.summary: Gets sorting and filtering command text for the axis set.
member.param: An to get the set string for.
A string that contains current axis set text.
member.returns: A string that contains original axis set text plus all the filtering and sorting commands.

member.name: T:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider
member.summary: Multidimensional data provider that uses ADOMD for .NET to connect and retrieve data from the multidimensional data source.
member.remarks: ADOMD for .NET is a .NET object model, used for building client applications that access an XML for an Analysis 1.1 compliant data provider, such as that provided by the XML for Analysis 1.1 SDK.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.#ctor
member.summary: Object constructor.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Object constructor used by ISerializable interface.
member.param: A object that represents the serialized information to be loaded.
A object.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.CheckConnection
member.summary: Checks the ADOMD connection status and tries to reconnect in case the connection is broken or closed.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.Connect
member.summary: Connects to the data source using the current connection string.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.Disconnect(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disconnects from the data source and optionally disposes the connection object.
member.param: True if connection object should be disposed.

member.summary: Creates a new dimension member class base on the ADOMD member object.
member.param: ADOMD member object.
New member dimension level.
New member parent member.
Indicates that the member is created from the cellset.
member.returns: Newly created dimension member object.

member.returns: The dimension type.

member.summary: Converts the ADOMD dimension level type.

member.summary: Checks if the given member is top level member.

member.returns: true if member is top level

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.GetAvailableCatalogNames
member.summary: Gets an array of available catalog names.

member.summary: Gets the data provider cube information collection.
member.returns: A object that contains a collection of cube information objects or null if multiple cubes are not supported.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.GetDataSchema(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the data schema for the specified cube.
member.param: A string that contains the cube name to get the data schema for.
member.returns: A object for the specified cube.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.GetLevelMembers(Dundas.Olap.Data.Level)
member.summary: Gets the dimension level members on-demand. This method is used for optimization purposes when the data provider supports MembersOnDemand.
member.param: Dimension object to get the members for.
member.returns: A object that contains collection of child level members.

member.summary: Gets the dimension level members on-demand. This method is used for optimization purposes when the data provider supports MembersOnDemand.
member.param: Dimension object to get the members for.
member.returns: A object that contains collection of child level members.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.GetParentMember(Dundas.Olap.Data.Member)
member.summary: Gets the parent member of specified member on-demand.
member.param: Dimension to get the parent member for.
member.returns: A parent or null for the top-level membber.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.GetChildMembers(Dundas.Olap.Data.Member)
member.summary: Gets the child members of specified member on-demand. This method is used for optimization purposes when the data provider supports MembersOnDemand.
member.param: Dimension to get the child members for.
member.returns: A object that contains collection of child members.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.ExecuteCellSet(System.String,Dundas.Olap.Data.CubeDataSchema,System.Boolean,Dundas.Olap.Data.AxisDescriptorCollection,Dundas.Olap.Data.AxisDescriptor)
member.summary: Retrieves multidimensional data from the provider.
member.param: A string value that represents the cube name to retrieve data from.
Cube data schema.
True if only non-empty cells should be retrieved.
An object that contains a collection of requested AxisDescriptors.
A slicer object.
member.returns: A result object.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.ExecuteCellSet(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves multidimensional data from the provider.
member.param: A string value that represents the cube name to retrieve data from.
True if only non-empty cells should be retrieved.
MDX query string.
member.returns: A result object.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.GetCell(Dundas.Olap.Data.CellSet,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Retrieves a single cell using an index for each data axis.
member.param: A object to get the cell from.
Array of indexes for each axes.
member.returns: Requested object.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.Close
member.summary: Closes the connection to the database.
member.remarks: It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled. An application can call Close more than one time without generating an exception.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.Open
member.summary: Opens the connection to the database.
member.remarks: This method can be called to ensure that connection with the database is established.

member.summary: Populates a SerializationInfo with the data needed to serialize the target object.
member.param: The SerializationInfo to populate with data.
The destination (see StreamingContext) for this serialization.
member.exception: The caller does not have the required permission.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes data provider object.

member.summary: Sends server control content to a provided object, which writes the content to be rendered on the client.
member.param: The object that receives the server control content.

member.name: P:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.CommandTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the time to wait for a command to run before terminating the attempt to run the command and generating an error.
member.value: An Integer that contains the time, in seconds, to wait for the command to run using the method.
member.remarks: If this property is set to 0, the ExecuteCellSet method waits indefinitely while attempting to run a command.

member.name: P:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.CurrentCellSet
member.summary: Gets current cellset.
member.value: A that contains the last retrieved data from the data provider.

member.name: P:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets ADOMD connection string.
member.value: A string value that contains the ADOMD .NET connection string. Refer to the ADOMD .NET documentation for more details.

member.summary: This member overrides property

member.summary: This member overrides the property.

member.name: P:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.UseImpersonation
member.summary: Indicates that current identity information should be included in connection pool.

member.name: P:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.CatalogName
member.summary: Gets current catalog name from the data provider.
member.value: A string value that contains current catalog name.

member.name: P:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.SupportsMultipleSlicerMemberSelection
member.summary: Checks if data provider supports selection of multiple dimension members on the Slicer axis.
member.value: Returns true if multiple member selection is supported on the Slicer axis.

member.name: P:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.IsConnected
member.summary: Checks if data provider is currently connected to the data source.
member.value: True if data provider is currently connected.

member.name: P:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.SupportsMembersOnDemand
member.summary: Gets the flag that indicates if the data provider supports on-demand member retrieval.
member.remarks: Retrieving metadata about all the members in the cube can be a time-consuming process. This property indicates if the data provider can retrieve members metadata only on-demand.
member.value: A boolean value that indicates if the data provider supports on-demand member retrieval.

member.name: P:Dundas.Olap.Data.AdomdNet.AdomdNetDataProvider.SupportsCubes
member.summary: Gets the flag that indicates if the data provider supports multiple cubes.
member.value: A boolean value that indicates if the data provider supports multiple cubes.
